divs: sighting detailsat approx 8:12 pdt i observed a blue light in the western sky traveling due north at a high rate of speed. conditions were high overcast with an opening where the setting sun was visable. i estimate the cloud ceiling at between 15-20k feet. at first i thought is was a meteor however there was no trail and it was below cloud level. there was no sound. i believe the object was parallel with the coast approximately 30 miles west of the location where it was observed. observed speed is estimated between 5-7 times greater than commercial passenger aircraft. the color was interesting in that it was a color similar to the blue\white color of certain car headlights. it was very bright but no defined form. i'm only reporting this to see if others observed this. so far, i have not been able to locate any observations posted on the internet.
Summary: Brilliant Blue light moving North at a very high rate of speed.
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in San Jose
There were no other sightings in San Jose on or around May 26th 2010
